nodes.text: The Sundari shipping docks was located just outside the Mandalorian capital city Sundari.
In 21 BBY, a skirmish took place at the docks when New Mandalorian forces battled with a Moogan smuggling ring who were bribing corrupt officials at the docks to allow slabin into the city.

In 19 BBY during the Siege of Mandalore, Ursa Wren's Mandalore resistance forces took over the docks from the Shadow Collective. Ahsoka Tano ordered Commander Rex to assist Wren, to prevent Maul from escaping the city.
